ApplicationPluginModel.name: VO OpenSearch Application
ApplicationPluginModel.description: This application allows to configure an open search application based on a Cone Search Protocol or Simple Image Access Protocol.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: tags
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a set of words that are used as keywords to identify and categorize this search content. Tags must be a single word and are delimited by the space character.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: imagePng
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a URL that identifies the location of an image that can be used in association with this search content.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: contact
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains an email address at which the maintener of the description document can be reached.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: description
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a human-readable text description of the search engine.
ApplicationPluginParameter.value: SITools2 connector providing an open search capability

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: imageIcon
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a URL that identifies the location of an image that can be used in association with this search content.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: longName
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains an extended human-readable title that identifies the search engine.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: syndicationRight
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a value that indicates the degree to which the search result provided by this search engine can be queried, displayed, and redistributed.

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: shortName
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Contains a brief human-readable title that identifies this search engine

ApplicationPluginParameter.name: cacheable
ApplicationPluginParameter.description: Set to true when the result can be cached

ApplicationPluginModel.label: Pacs-SAG4-Herschel
